quoteText:
The Website is Available "AS-IS"

Your access to and use of the Website or any Content are at your own risk. You understand and agree that the Website is provided to you on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis.
title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
